posts.post_title: SOLD: A Handful of Old Judges, fresh from Grading!
posts.post_content:
Prices are in Paypal FF and shipped. (Goods OK if Buyer covers fees)

Will DEFINITELY listen to offers, especially on multiples, as these can be tricky to price (not in SMR). Better scans are on my eBay

PM, post or email at [url]smvintage13@gmail.com[/url] with interest

ALL CARDS SOLD, PENDING PAYMENT
